voicesplitting.voice.hmm

Class HmmVoiceSplittingModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • voicesplitting.generic.MidiModel
      • voicesplitting.voice.VoiceSplittingModel
        • voicesplitting.voice.hmm.HmmVoiceSplittingModel

  • public class HmmVoiceSplittingModel
extends VoiceSplittingModel
    This is the Voice Splitting algorithm submitted to ISMIR 2015. It involves a modified hmm algorithm.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 7 April, 2015

      A TreeSet of the States containing the most likely voice splits for the given song.

      The parameters we are going to use for this run.
